articles.title: WATCH: Why GOP Sen. Ron Johnson's seat is the most endangered in the midterms - CNN Video
articles.description: Sen. Ron Johnson (R-WI) is considered to be one of the most vulnerable Republicans facing reelection this year. CNN's Manu Raju explains what he's up against in his fight to stay in the Senate.

articles.title: Historic Veranda House on Nantucket Island devastated by massive fire - CNN Video
articles.description: A massive fire hit the downtown area of Nantucket Island in Massachusetts. The historic Veranda House was one of the buildings damaged by the fire.

articles.author: Samantha Beech and Christina Maxouris, CNN
articles.title: Firefighters are battling a massive blaze on Nantucket Island, which damaged a historic hotel and several other buildings
articles.description: Massachusetts firefighters were battling a large blaze first reported at a hotel on Nantucket Island.

articles.author: Simone Pathe, CNN
articles.title: The 10 Senate seats most likely to flip in 2022
articles.description: With more than half of this year's competitive Senate matchups set, the overall electoral environment remains consistent: President Joe Biden's poor approval numbers, combined with a pervasive sense that the country is headed in the wrong direction, are weigh…

articles.author: Jacquelyne Germain, CNN
articles.title: Chicago's 4th of July weekend death toll surpassed the Highland Park shooting. 'I thought there would be more outcry,' mother says
articles.description: As the nation was shocked by a premeditated mass shooting in Highland Park, residents an hour away on Chicago's South and West Sides were also grieving a death and injury toll that surpassed that of Highland Park.

articles.author: Helen Regan, Emiko Jozuka, Mayumi Maruyama
articles.title: Who is Tetsuya Yamagami? What we know about the man suspected of shooting Shinzo Abe
articles.description: Police in Japan have launched a murder investigation into the assassination of former Japanese prime minister Shinzo Abe -- but little is known about the suspect who was arrested at the scene of the fatal shooting on Friday.
articles.content: Police in Japan have launched a murder investigation into the assassination of former Japanese prime minister Shinzo Abe but little is known about the suspect who was arrested at the scene of the fat… [+2263 chars]

articles.author: Douglas Heye
articles.title: Opinion: Republicans, look across the pond and take note. Now's the time to dump Trump
articles.description: That the Tories dumping Johnson went from an unthinkable idea to an inevitable outcome should be a lesson to Republicans here in America. They, too, can bypass more political chaos by dumping Donald Trump, once and for all, writes Douglas Heye.
articles.content: Editors Note: Douglas Heye is the ex-deputy chief of staff to former House Majority Leader Eric Cantor, a GOP strategist and a CNN political commentator. Follow him on Twitter @dougheye. The opinions… [+4271 chars]

articles.author: Fredreka Schouten, CNN
articles.title: Wisconsin Supreme Court prohibits use of most ballot drop boxes
articles.description: The ruling deals a blow to Democrats ahead of crucial contests in a battleground state.

articles.author: Andrew Kaczynski and Em Steck, CNN
articles.title: Herschel Walker partnered in 2012 with arm of energy company accused by multiple states of deceptive practices
articles.description: Georgia Republican Senate nominee Herschel Walker was once a "partner" and "spokesman" for a subsidiary of an energy company, Just Energy, which was repeatedly targeted by states' attorneys general and utility agencies over allegedly deceptive practices.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: Here's why Democrats could keep the Senate
articles.description: Election Day 2022 is now four months away. Democrats are trying to hold on to slim majorities in both the House and Senate. They're doing so against the backdrop of high inflation and an economy viewed in poor shape, which is the issue dominating voters' mind…
